Posts.Content: Hello everyone, My tumor was er-/pr-. I am waiting for the results of my Her2 status. I thought that er-/pr- was good news as I don't have to take hormone therapy but after reading several posts on different discussion boards, I'm not so sure. I was wondering if anybody could give me any advice on this. Love Lisa x
Posts.Signature: Age 29. Happily married for 11 yrs. 2 boys aged 11 & 9. Diagnosed on 20 Aug'05 Mastectomy with ANC on 5 Oct'05. Delayed reconstruction. Results are- 3cm tumor, grade 2, 16 lymph nodes removed 2 involved, er/pr-.
Posts.Title: er-/pr-

Posts.Content: Hi everyone, I have a few questions- Do all types of chemo cause hair loss? How effective is the cold cap? My hair is long at the mo & the thought of losing it worries me. Should I get it cut short to get used to the idea of having less hair? I have my first appointment with the oncologist on 10 Nov so I don't know which chemo I'm having yet. I'm sorry if I sound vain. Thanks in advance, Lisa x
Posts.Signature: Age 29. Happily married for 11 yrs. 2 boys aged 11 & 9. Diagnosed on 20 Aug'05 Mastectomy with ANC on 5 Oct'05. Delayed reconstruction. Results are- 3cm tumor, grade 2, 16 lymph nodes removed 2 involved, er/pr-.

Posts.Content: I just wanted to thank you for your kind words & advice, Lots of love Lisa x

Posts.Title: Will I lose my hair?

Posts.Content: Hi everyone. I'm new to this site & this is my first posting. I'd like to introduce myself. My name is Lisa & I am 29yrs old(30 on 15 Nov) I was diagnosed with breast cancer on 20 Aug and had a mastectomy with ANC on 5 Oct. My results were as follows - 3cm tumor, grade 2, 16 lymph nodes removed 2 involved, er/pr-. I've been told I don't need radiotherapy but I'm having chemo. I was just wondering if there is anybody else with a similar diagnosis to mine. What type of chemo are you having? Any advice would be greatly appreciated. Thanks in advance, Lisa x
Posts.Signature: Age 29. Happily married for 11 yrs. 2 boys aged 11 & 9. Diagnosed on 20 Aug'05 Mastectomy with ANC on 5 Oct'05. Delayed reconstruction. Results are- 3cm tumor, grade 2, 16 lymph nodes removed 2 involved, er/pr-.
